pandas is a <a class="reference external" href="http://www.python.org/" target="_blank">Python</a> package providing fast, flexible, and expressive data structures designed to make working with “relational” or “labeled” data both easy and intuitive. It aims to be the fundamental high-level building block for doing practical, real world data analysis in Python.

Additionally, it has the broader goal of becoming the most powerful and flexible open source data analysis / manipulation tool available in any language.
